content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day July 12, 2021 Adobe Cloud Services Phishing Adobe Spark Scams  More July 12, 2021 Threat actors are always on the lookout for inconspicuous ways to execute malicious attacks. One such tactic that has become common is the use of legitimate services as part of phishing campaigns. Since April this year, researchers at Cyren have seen a rise in phishing URLs linked from spark.adobe.com pages.
